quotes.quote1: While you were sleeping, Pecky bought the dip.

quotes.quote10: Counting your chickens before they hatch...

home.title: Home
home.description: Pecky - Earn tokens by staking Supra, holding ChickenWings NFTs, and using our Discord bot. 100% community-owned with zero team tokens.

intro.story: Pecky was just a normal chicken‚Ä¶ until he ate a weird Dorito behind the barn. Now he thinks he has a secret mission to "uncrack the egg of truth" ‚Äî whatever that means. He's sure the rooster is a spy and fights scarecrows like they're evil robots.
intro.tokenInfo: No teamtokens, No premine, Pecky is 100% owned by the Supra community.

staking.title: Staking
staking.description: Stake Supra on Meridian Node to earn 8% APY + daily Pecky rewards, or stake Pecky on Nodes for passive income. All staking rewards with zero fees.

meridian.title: Stake $Supra on the Meridian Node
meridian.benefit3: 50% of the node's profit is used to buy & burn $Pecky!
meridian.vaultDisclaimer: As long as the airdrop vault still has $Pecky left.

staking.benefit1: Stake your $PECKY on a node of your choice and let those golden eggs grow
staking.benefit2: You can unstake anytime ‚Äî but your chicks need
staking.enterAmount: Please enter a valid stake amount

unstaking.title: Your Staked Nodes & Pending Unstakes
unstaking.subtitle: Manage your stakes and claim rewards
unstaking.unlockNote: Claims become available after the unlock time.
unstaking.disclaimer: Claim rewards or unstake anytime (2 days unlock period before claiming unstaked funds).
unstaking.enterValidAmount: Please enter a valid amount to unstake

owned.title: Your Nodes
owned.subtitle: Manage your node operator rewards and linked NFTs
owned.infoTitle: Pecky Node Operator: Things to Know
owned.activationReq1: You must own the Pecky Node Original NFT.
owned.activationReq2: You must have a minimum amount of Pecky LP tokens:
owned.warningText: If your node becomes inactive (you lose the NFT or LP tokens):
owned.warningPoint1: All unclaimed operator rewards are lost immediately.
owned.warningPoint2: Reward accumulation stops until you're eligible again.
owned.warningPoint3: When reactivated, you start earning from zero again.
owned.boostingText1: Attach Chicken Wings Original NFTs to increase your APY.
owned.boostingText3: Each rarity can be linked once (cannibals can be linked extra).
owned.boostingText4: You must hold the NFTs in your wallet ‚Äî if you sell or lose them, they stop counting.
owned.rewardsPoint1: The total PECKY staked on your node, and
owned.rewardsPoint2: Your attached rarity NFTs (which define your APY).
owned.rewardsText2: Claim regularly (<30 days) to keep rewards growing.
owned.rewardsText3: Payouts come from the global staking vault ‚Äî if empty, the staking period has come to an end.
owned.habit1: ‚úÖ Keep your Node NFT and LP tokens intact.
owned.habit2: ‚úÖ Claim at least once every 30 days.
owned.habit3: ‚úÖ Hold attached NFTs to maintain your boosted APY.
owned.habit4: ‚úÖ Avoid deactivation ‚Äî once inactive, you lose your unclaimed rewards.
owned.noNodes: It seems you don't own a node yet!
owned.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to see your owned nodes

bot.title: Discord Bot
bot.description: Connect your wallet to unlock bot features
bot.pageDescription: Activate PeckyBot on Discord for NFT bid notifications and Crystara marketplace alerts. Pay 5,000 $SUPRA to activate, then extend with Pecky tokens.
bot.heading: PECKYBOT on Discord
bot.feature1: Get notifications when someone bids on your NFT
bot.feature2: Set alerts for any top 25 NFT on Crystara with your rarity, below your chosen price
bot.gasText: After that, you only need Pecky as gas to keep the bot active.
bot.burnNotice: All $Pecky used for the bot will be burned.
bot.keepExtending: Use the bot as long as you keep extending!
bot.enterValidDays: Please enter a valid number of days

info.title: Info
info.description: Learn about Pecky, the community-driven token on Supra with zero team tokens. Discover how we burn Pecky through staking, NFT royalties, and PeckyBot.
info.ogDescription: Learn about Pecky, the community-driven token on Supra with zero team tokens.
info.introText:
Pecky was hatched from the ChickenWings NFT collection.
Pecky is a true community token with zero team tokens. Hold your Peckys tight, because we burn everything we can get our wings on!
info.burningRitualHeading: How does our burning ritual work?

staking.title: STAKING
staking.description:
Stake your $SUPRA on the Meridian node and get the same 8% node rewards as anywhere else,
but you also get the same amount of $Pecky as your daily staked $SUPRA!
Even better: 50% of the node rewards are used to buy up and burn $Pecky for the community!

nfts.title: NFTs
nfts.description:
All NFTs sold on the Crystara marketplace have a 5% royalty.
Instead of keeping these fees, we use every penny to buy and burn Pecky!

peckybot.title: PECKYBOT
peckybot.description:
On Discord, our bot helps NFT traders by sending instant alerts when:
‚Ä¢ someone bids on your NFT
‚Ä¢ a top collection NFT is listed below your set price
All Pecky used as gas for the bot is instantly sent to the burn pile!

info.questionsText: Have questions? Join our Discord or check us out on X!
